name: Cog-468
body:
## Created by Joseph Spernyak
# About this page
This Capstone research project presents documents pertaining to my work and study in the Cognitive Science Capstone Course at SUNY Oswego.  Most of the documents pertain to my Capstone Research Project.  Some are associated with preparations for the Cognitive Science Capstone Exam.  The remaining documents present miscellaneous course highlights or elements of enrichment that relate to the Cognitive Science Capstone Course experience.  

# Research problem finding documents
The following three documents represent interests that I may potentially wish to explore for my Cognitive Science Capstone research Project.  

[Interest 1: Original Ideas](http://www.cs.oswego.edu/~jspernya/COG%20468/Interest%201%20-%20Original%20Ideas.pdf) | [Interest 2: Artifical Cognitive Systems] (http://www.cs.oswego.edu/~jspernya/COG%20468/Interest%202-%20Artificial%20Cognitive%20Systems.pdf) | [Interest 3: Network Theory] (http://www.cs.oswego.edu/~jspernya/COG%20468/Interest%203-%20Network%20Theory.pdf)

# Candidate Research Problems 
[1. Musical Composition] (http://www.cs.oswego.edu/~jspernya/COG%20468/Candidate%20Research%20Problem%201.pdf) |

# Craft of Research (CoR) top 10 lists
These documents present my take on the top 10 most salient ideas to be found in the chapters of The Craft of Research.  
[CoR 1] (http://www.cs.oswego.edu/~jspernya/COG%20468/Craft%20of%20Research%201.pdf) | [CoR 2] (http://www.cs.oswego.edu/~jspernya/COG%20468/Craft%20of%20Research%202.pdf) | [CoR 3] (http://www.cs.oswego.edu/~jspernya/COG%20468/Craft%20of%20Research%203.pdf) | [CoR 4] (http://www.cs.oswego.edu/~jspernya/COG%20468/Craft%20of%20Research%204.pdf) | [CoR 5](http://www.cs.oswego.edu/~jspernya/COG%20468/Craft%20of%20Research%205.pdf) | [CoR 6] (http://www.cs.oswego.edu/~jspernya/COG%20468/Craft%20of%20Research%206.pdf) | [CoR 7](http://www.cs.oswego.edu/~jspernya/COG%20468/Craft%20of%20Research%207.pdf) | [CoR 8] (http://www.cs.oswego.edu/~jspernya/COG%20468/Craft%20of%20Research%208.pdf) | [CoR 9] (http://www.cs.oswego.edu/~jspernya/COG%20468/Craft%20of%20Research%209.pdf) | [CoR 10] (http://www.cs.oswego.edu/~jspernya/COG%20468/Craft%20of%20Research%2010.pdf) |


# Classic Papers
This section contains analyses of Classic Papers and their relevance to Cognitive Science learning outcomes.

[Classic Paper 1 Computing Machinery and Intelligence](http://www.cs.oswego.edu/~jspernya/COG%20468/Classic%20Paper%201.pdf) 
 
[Classic Paper 2 Computer Science as Empirical Inquiry: Symbols and Search](http://www.cs.oswego.edu/~jspernya/COG%20468/Classic%20Paper%202.pdf)

[Classic Paper 3 The Magical Number Seven, Plus or Minus Two: Some Limits on our Capacity for
Processing Information] (http://www.cs.oswego.edu/~jspernya/COG%20468/Classic%20Paper%203.pdf)
